Posts.Content: Sep 19, 2009 10:31AM rondalyn wrote: I just went this Friday for a Magnafied View of what my doctor is refering to as Calcifications.  He said I was in the "middle" group, but that I didn't have to wait a couple of months to see what happened.  Instead we are going to do a biopsy next Friday.  I am trying really hard not to let this all bother me, but lets face it, this is a bit scary.  I have read so much on it I don't know what is right anymore.  Large and round is good, small and scattered?  And I can't remember what the hell my test was showing anyway because I was in a state of shock.
Posts.Title: Breast Calcifications azcamm Makratz

Posts.Content: Sep 19, 2009 10:51AM rondalyn wrote: Thank you, and you are right.  I have to remeber that.  And when I get a glimpse past the immediate fear (just got the results today) I know that I am ok.  Of course now that all I can focus on is my right breast it has taken to throbing!
